definition: to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with

sentences.english: This process is now China does not need the U. S. to re-tie the comprador .
sentences.chinese: 這個過程現在已不需要中國的美元買辦們再配合了。

sentences.english: Compradors had made much contribution to the foundation of the insurance industry.
sentences.chinese: 買辦於民族保險業實有開拓奠基之功。

sentences.english: In addition, this part discusses the process that the compradors of Xiangshan changed to the national entrepreneur in 19 century.
sentences.chinese: 論述了19世紀末香山買辦向民族企業家轉變的過程。

sentences.english: The compradors, gentry merchants were two newly rising classes of the modern commercial society.
sentences.chinese: 買辦和紳商是近代商業社會中的兩大新興羣體。

sentences.english: Exploration on the comprador is an important topic to understand modern age China.
sentences.chinese: 買辦研究是有助於我們瞭解近代中國的一個重要課題。

sentences.english: The comprador -bourgeoisie is always a running dog of imperialism and a target of the revolution.
sentences.chinese: 買辦資產階級始終是帝國主義的走狗，革命的對象。

sentences.english: Although he be subjected comprador class, but it is not similar goals and general comprador.
sentences.chinese: 他雖然寄身買辦階層，但和一般買辦並不氣味相投。

sentences.english: Although he be subjected comprador class, but it is not similar goals and general comprador.
sentences.chinese: 他雖然寄身買辦階層，但和一般買辦並不氣味相投。

sentences.english: The first force is the landlord class and the comprador big bourgeoisie in nature.
sentences.chinese: 第一種力量是地主階級和買辦性的大資產階級。

sentences.english: This article retraces the lives of Chinese compradors in the eighteenth century.
sentences.chinese: 這篇文章回顧了十八世紀中國買辦的生活。

sentences.english: This is the comprador class by the bureaucracy and the civilian population constitutes a proletarian mode of the dumbbell.
sentences.chinese: 這是由官僚買辦階級與平民無產者構成的啞鈴模式。

sentences.english: Today's evil comprador forces are traitors.
sentences.chinese: 現在的買辦惡勢力就是漢奸。

sentences.english: We have been speaking here mainly about the upper or comprador bourgeoisie.
sentences.chinese: 這裏主要談的是上層或者買辦資產階級。

sentences.english: The comprador-bourgeoisie has long been discredited.
sentences.chinese: 買辦資產階級早就臭了。
